scripts.dev: npm run coverage && cd dev && npm run dev
scripts.reset: pnpm run clean && pnpm run setup
scripts.update: npm config set registry=https://registry.npmmirror.com/ && pnpm up -r --unsafe-perm && npm config set registry=https://registry.npmjs.org/
scripts.ci: git add . && git commit -m "ci commit " && git push
scripts.prerelease: npm run setup && lerna version prerelease --yes && npm run test && npm run build && npm run ci && lerna publish from-package --dist-tag test --no-private --yes && pnpm run sync
scripts.patch: npm run setup && lerna version patch --yes && npm run build && npm run ci && lerna publish from-package --force-publish --no-private --yes && pnpm run sync
scripts.minor: npm run setup && lerna version minor --yes && npm run build && npm run ci && lerna publish from-package --force-publish --no-private --yes && pnpm run sync
scripts.docs:build: cd docs && vitepress build && cd .. && npm run typedoc
